title: Compiler panic when running cargo clippy on glium
body:
I tried running `cargo clippy` on the latest version of glium, and this happened (Running the latest nightly version of rust):

```
RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo clippy
   Compiling glium v0.10.0 (file:///home/kokxx/dev/rust/glium)
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` (left: `1174`, right: `1176`)', ../src/librbml/lib.rs:484

stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7f976e8fec4e - sys::backtrace::write::h31b60a04d5b9a81ckqs
   2:     0x7f976e906af4 - panicking::on_panic::haca2ec19b0bb0f31B8w
   3:     0x7f976e8c963e - rt::unwind::begin_unwind_inner::h384bd76ff13d8e66fOw
   4:     0x7f976e8ca36c - rt::unwind::begin_unwind_fmt::hf78032cbbe2296b5lNw
   5:     0x7f97684412c7 - reader::doc_as_u32::h9ef486837a6e1957IJa
   6:     0x7f976caf4157 - metadata::creader::CrateReader<'a>::find_plugin_registrar::h9c1187daa03712e0aRn
   7:     0x7f976cb317cf - plugin::load::PluginLoader<'a>::load_plugin::h3cd5f4f47cf8454aOSt
   8:     0x7f976cb3138d - plugin::load::load_plugins::hc2021d64aa682a34tPt
   9:     0x7f976ee4b6a1 - driver::phase_2_configure_and_expand::hcb65c5920cf60903ita
  10:     0x7f976ee3cd3a - driver::compile_input::h68c27ba828e71325Tba
  11:     0x7f976ef1aaf3 - run_compiler::h21d74b88eec3fe3bx7b
  12:     0x7f976ef184ce - boxed::F.FnBox<A>::call_box::h16056439662428537931
  13:     0x7f976ef17d19 - rt::unwind::try::try_fn::h6148543393464578718
  14:     0x7f976e97ee58 - rust_try_inner
  15:     0x7f976e97ee45 - rust_try
  16:     0x7f976e8f1ec7 - rt::unwind::try::inner_try::h472293c152f3b97e8Jw
  17:     0x7f976ef17f2b - boxed::F.FnBox<A>::call_box::h18323747056190398050
  18:     0x7f976e905751 - sys::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::hed666015e7925bf95Tv
  19:     0x7f9768f8c4a3 - start_thread
  20:     0x7f976e56013c - clone
  21:                0x0 - <unknown>

Could not compile `glium`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```

I'm not really sure whats going on here and am a little busy to dive into the code, but I hope the report helps.
